languages.text: {n}Абесс проводит пальцами по острому краю клинка.{/n} "Твои бывшие пленники. У тебя есть возможность исправить ошибку, стоившую тебе места подле твоего Архонта".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абесс проводит пальцами по острому краю клинка.{/n} "Твои бывшие пленники, наложник. У тебя есть возможность исправить ошибку, стоившую тебе места подле твоего Архонта".
traits.speaker: DrukhariEliteAbess

languages.text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."

languages.text: {n}Aebys fait courir ses doigts le long de sa lame.{/n} « Vos anciens captifs. Vous avez une chance de corriger l'erreur que vous avez faite en refusant la faveur de l'archonte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abess fait courir ses doigts le long de sa lame.{/n} « Vos anciens captifs. Vous avez une chance de corriger l'erreur que vous avez faite en refusant la faveur de l'archonte. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariEliteAbess

languages.text: {n}阿贝斯手指轻抚刀刃。{/n}“这些人都是你以前的俘虏。你犯下的错误让你失去了执政官的宠幸，现在就是你弥补错误的机会。”
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝斯手指轻抚刀刃。{/n}“这些人都是你以前的俘虏。你犯下的错误让你失去了执政官的宠幸，现在就是你弥补错误的机会。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariEliteAbess

languages.text: {n}アベスは刃先に指を走らせた。{/n}「元捕虜ども。主人であるアーコンの寵愛を失った過ちを正すチャンスだぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベスは刃先に指を走らせた。{/n}「元捕虜ども。主人であるアーコンの寵愛を失った過ちを正すチャンスだぞ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariEliteAbess

languages.text: {n}Aebys fährt mit den Fingern über den Rand seiner Klinge.{/n} "Eure früheren Gefangenen. Ihr habt jetzt die Chance, Euren Fehler zu korrigieren, durch Euch die Gunst Eures Archons gekostet hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abess fährt mit den Fingern über den Rand seiner Klinge.{/n} "Eure früheren Gefangenen. Ihr habt jetzt die Chance, Euren Fehler zu korrigieren, durch Euch die Gunst Eures Archons gekostet hat."
traits.speaker: DrukhariEliteAbess

languages.text: {n}Aebys pasa los dedos por el filo de su espada.{/n} «Tus antiguos prisioneros. Tienes una oportunidad de rectificar el error que te llevó a perder el favor de tu arconte».
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abess pasa los dedos por el filo de su espada.{/n} «Tus antiguos prisioneros. Tienes una oportunidad de rectificar el error que te llevó a perder el favor de tu arconte».
traits.speaker: DrukhariEliteAbess

languages.text: {n}Aebys, parmaklarını kılıcının sırtında gezdiriyor.{/n} "Eski esirlerin. Arkon'un lütfunu yitirmene sebep olan hatayı telafi etme şansın ayağına geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys runs his fingers along the edge of his blade.{/n} "Your former captives. You have a chance to rectify the mistake that made you forfeit your Archon's favour."
